testcase.name: I want to add a new report of an employee
testcase.system-out: Given I am already logged into OrangeHrm and in Reports tab.................passed When I click on Add Button..................................................passed Then I should be redirected to Add report page..............................passed When I enter Report Name and Display Field..................................passed Then New Employee report should be created..................................passed

testcase.name: I want to Delete employee reports
testcase.system-out: Given I have Already Logged in OrangeHrm and opened Report pannel...........passed And I have selected reports to delete.......................................passed When I click on Delete button and Click on Ok button........................passed Then The selected report should be deleted succesfully......................passed

testcase.name: I want to edit Employee report
testcase.system-out: Given I Have Already Logged in OrangeHrm And opened Report pannel...........passed When I clickon Edit Button..................................................passed Then Edit Report page must open.............................................passed

testcase.name: I want to add a new invalid report of an employee

failure.message: Invalid report shopuld not be saved ==> expected: not equal but was: <@@>

testcase.name: I want to Search Employee report with the help of report name
